title: Assessment: Parts and Habitats of Animals

questions.question: What is an animal's home called?
Which of these animals lives in the forest?
What do we call an animal's outer covering, like feathers or scales?
Which part of a bird helps it to fly?
Where does a bird usually live?
What do you call a place where a bear lives in the wild?
Which animal has a long neck and lives in the jungle?
What animal lives as a pet in a house?
Which animal has a hard shell and lives in the water?
What is the part of a dog's body that wags when it's happy?
